unnormalised: Hey! Any news on Jadeja? Last I heard, Dr. Sharma was checking him out. Hopefully, it's nothing too serious before the IPL auction in Mumbai. We need him back ASAP! Heard the stadium needs renovations too – like 5000 sq ft. Hope the BCCI has the Rs. for it! Get well soon, champ! We are waiting for you!
